title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.2 - Limitations on lessee of partnership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.2 - Limitations on lessee of partnership

State Regulations
A horse owned by a partnership in which the number of
members or proportionate interest of any member does not meet the requirements
of section
4220.1
may be entered and run only
by a lessee of its racing qualities, which lessee shall be an individual or a
partnership in which the number of members and the proportionate interest of
every member meets the requirements of section
4220.1. In such a case, the lessee
may be a member of or may include one or more members of the owning
partnership. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4220.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
